text:
Hildur Ingveldar Guðnadóttir (born 4 September 1982) is an Icelandic musician and composer. She is known for composing the soundtracks for the 2019 miniseries "Chernobyl" and the 2019 comic movie "Joker. S"he won a Golden Globe Award from it.
She has played and recorded with the bands Pan Sonic, Throbbing Gristle, Múm and Stórsveit Nix Noltes. She also toured with Animal Collective and Sunn O))).
